thread.title: Eminem to headline Leeds festival | Calendar
thread.title_full: Eminem to headline Leeds festival | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Eminem to headline Leeds festival | Calendar
text:
Eminem is one of the biggest selling artists of the 21st century Credit: PA Eminem has been announced as the third and final headliner for this year's Leeds festival.
The rapper is one of the biggest selling artists of the 21st century, his razor-sharp wit and impeccable larger than life anthems continue to defy boundaries, with the likes of ‘Lose Yourself’, ‘My Name Is’, ’Not Afraid' and ‘The Monster’ all storming charts and record collections around the world.
He returns to the perform at the festival for the third time.
The festival takes place on 25-27 August at Bramham Park, Leeds
More information can be found here
Eminem returning to Reading and Leeds is beyond exciting. His 2013 headline performance was incredible and I can’t want to have him back. In addition to our third and final headliner (joining Kasabian and Muse) we’ve announced over 70 additional acts to this year’s line up - it’s looking stronger than ever.
– Melvin Benn Last updated Fri 24 Feb 2017 Leeds Festival Eminem
